__e: Worrying about place settings, when we could be destroyed by aliens, at any minute.
Once, for a moment, a group was able to share the energy amongst themselves, but even they were quickly destroyed by it.
You all keep saying she's not Army. But she had her business, her home and her heart destroyed by one of our own.
So we're gonna drive into the tunnel full of fucking smashed cars...
And then they are destroyed and they feel death, and all they can say is, "Why?"
All records will be destroyed and you are forbidden to speak about it to anyone!
